column2: Enter a variable name for the new indicator you want to create
column3: Enter the name of the variable going into the composite indicator. The  spelling must exactly match the column header in the dataset - select from the drop down
column4: value that the variable takes on to be counted in the composite indicator. All answers not specified will be counted as 0
column5: weight in the composite indicator if the variable takes on the value in D

column6: Copy this  block and add it below to create additional indicators
